archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Interoperable European Solution
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
A solution, developed by Public Administrations that facilitate the delivery of electronic Public Services and cross-border exchange of information between Public Administrations (or Citizens) in support to the implementation and advancement of EU, national or local Public Policies.
Based on ISA TES definition https://joinup.ec.europa.eu/node/149889

properties.value: [ Study | Development | Pilot | Operational | Phased out ]

[ Asset management | Audit | External communication | Internal communication | Document management | Financial management | Grant management | Human resources | IT | Legislative lifecycle | Procurement | Program management | Strategic planning and programming | Statistics management | Case management | Trans-European Systems and Infrastructure management | Crisis management | Structured Data Exchange Management | Committee and expert group meeting management | None of them ]*
